headline: Air Products and Chemicals downgraded by JP Morgan, BMO Capital
summary: Investing.com -- Analysts at JP Morgan and BMO Capital Markets downgraded Air Products and Chemicals Inc (NYSE:APD) on concerns over earnings growth, currency headwinds, and management transition.

headline: Air Liquide: An Industrial Gas Compounder Trading At Fair Value
summary: Air Liquide is the second-largest industrial gas producer globally, only behind Linde, but ahead of Air Products & Chemical in terms of sales and market capitalization. Read more here.
